name: Acrobat
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Rogue-type agility, but without emphasis on sneakiness.

  • Hard to pin down

  • Significantly able to get into places others can't (PARKOUR!)

WEAPONS

  • Light, special (ropes, chains, grappling hook, big pole, blowgun, etc.)

ENGAGEMENT

  • LOTS, but only if you have movement to spend?

ABILITIES

  • Can always double move, but can't do much if out of movement

  • Parkour shit - really incentivize wild moves
